I would like the government (as a whole) to make a general shift in the way they handle communications.
I signed an on-line e petition recently to my Local MP and was dismayed to find that my MP had chosen to respond by post as opposed to via the email address supplied.

This petition is to request the government use E-mail as a primary method of communication where the information is not "Data Sensitive" and only where the Email is provided by the individual.

This will save considerable amount of time and a considerable amount of postal costs.

This is a simple cost cutting measure that will help reduce pressure on the public purse strings.
